plot: The spirit of Sister Juana Inés de la Cruz becomes known through a student (Sofía Mazagatos) who goes to Mexico to finish her thesis, confronting a century saturated with marvellous inventions but also plagued with injustices.
title: Las pasiones de sor Juana
plot_es: The spirit of Sister Juana Inés de la Cruz becomes known through a student (Sofía Mazagatos) who goes to Mexico to finish her thesis, confronting a century saturated with marvellous inventions but also plagued with injustices.
plot_en: The spirit of Sister Juana Inés de la Cruz becomes known through a student (Sofía Mazagatos) who goes to Mexico to finish her thesis, confronting a century saturated with marvellous inventions but also plagued with injustices.
